title: CalcWear
summary: A great calculator add-on for any Android Wear Smart Watch!
description: One of the first Android Wear calculator apps designed specifically for round smart watch displays.WARNINGThis has been created specifically with the moto 360 in mind. NOW SUPPORTS SQUARE.... I think..... shoot me an email with photos if it isn't correctly working!
descriptionHTML:
One of the first Android Wear calculator apps designed specifically for round smart watch displays.


WARNING
This has been created specifically with the moto 360 in mind.

NOW SUPPORTS SQUARE.... I think..... shoot me an email with photos if it isn't correctly working!
comments: I love this calculator app! The app works perfectly, probably recommend this app! I hope this app will not be abandoned and will have a lot of users!
Good start. Layout is a little off. ui needs some work.
recentChanges: Support for square watch faces! (added the xml file this time...)
Fixed memory function on the application.
Added ability to do an operation on your answer.
